name: Andreas Lanitis
content: CYPRUS UNIVERSITY OF TECHNOLOGY ΕΛ EN 20 Years CUT myUni Library Faculties Faculty of Fine and Applied Arts Department of Multimedia and Graphic Arts Staff Elected Andreas Lanitis Faculties Faculty of Fine and Applied Arts Department of Multimedia and Graphic Arts Staff Elected Andreas Lanitis Andreas Lanitis Professor Department of Multimedia and Graphic Arts andreas.lanitis@cut.ac.cy 25002569 https://ktisis.cut.ac.cy/cris/rp/rp00016 Andreas Lanitis is a Professor, in the Department of Multimedia and Graphic Arts, Cyprus University of Technology and a Multidisciplinary Research Group Leader at the Research Centre of Excellence on Interactive media, Smart systems and Emerging technologies (RISE). Andreas received the degree of B.Eng in Electronic Engineering (1991) and PhD in Image Processing and Computer Vision (1995), both from the University of Manchester, UK. Subsequently he carried out research in the Division of Imaging Science and Biomedical Engineering, University of Manchester. Between 1997 and 2007 he worked at the School of Sciences and Engineering, Cyprus College. His research interests are [...]focused on Digital Image Processing, Interpretation and Synthesis, pattern identification, machine learning and Virtual Reality applications. Andreas is the founder and coordinator of the "Visual Media Computing Lab" as well as, the leader of the "Biometrics for Smart Human-centred Emerging Technologies" research team at the Research Centre of Excellence in Cyprus focusing on Interactive media, Smart systems and Emerging technologies (RISE). Links: Research Lab: https://www.cut.ac.cy/faculties/aac/mga/research/visual-media-computing/ Andreas Lanitis Τεχνολογικό Πανεπιστήμιο Κύπρου Professor Andreas Lanitis is a Professor, in the Department of Multimedia and Graphic Arts, Cyprus University of Technology and a Multidisciplinary Research Group Leader at the Research Centre of Excellence on Interactive media, Smart systems and Emerging technologies (RISE). Andreas received the degree of B.Eng in Electronic Engineering (1991) and PhD in Image Processing and Computer Vision (1995), both from the University of Manchester, UK. Subsequently he carried out research in the Division of Imaging Science and Biomedical Engineering, University of Manchester. Between 1997 and 2007 he worked at the School of Sciences and Engineering, Cyprus College. His research interests are focused on Digital Image Processing, Interpretation and Synthesis, pattern identification, machine learning and Virtual Reality applications.  Andreas is the founder and coordinator of the "Visual Media Computing Lab" as well as, the leader of the "Biometrics for Smart Human-centred Emerging Technologies" research team at the  Research Centre of Excellence in Cyprus focusing on Interactive media, Smart systems and Emerging technologies (RISE). Links: Research Lab: https://www.cut.ac.cy/faculties/aac/mga/research/visual-media-computing/ Κύπρος andreas.lanitis@cut.ac.cy 25002569 STAFF SEARCH Academic Staff Administrative Staff Maps University Map Sitemap Virtual Tour Quick Links Student Login eLearning (Moodle) CUT Mail (students and staff on Office365) Password Reset Multi Factor Authentication (MFA) Απομακρυσμένη Πρόσβαση (VPN) cut-radio Intent Europe Direct green@cut Learning Development Network Personal Data Protection Policy Intranet Useful Videos Contact Details ΤΕΧΝΟΛΟΓΙΚΟ ΠΑΝΕΠΙΣΤΗΜΙΟ ΚΥΠΡΟΥ 30 Arch.
